title: Noble Lies
description: It is not much of a fairy tale at all. By the time they meet, Jez is burdened by dark truths and fears for her family. Michaelâ€™s heart is already entangled in a forbidden love. The Church is watching - closely, and guarding more secrets than just arranged marriage details. For Jez and Michael, simply marrying their match becomes complicated...and deadly. Not everyone will live happily ever after.
author: Stephanie Andrassy
